So now, since they couldn't do it through Congress, the Trump-Pence administration is looking for other ways they can block patients from getting essential care at Planned Parenthood health centers #IStandWithPP

They tried to do this through Congress six times last year -- and each time it was defeated because of the huge grassroots outpouring of opposition. Which isn't surprising -- 80% of the public supports access to Planned Parenthood.
Today, the Trump-Pence administration released a letter to states encouraging them to (illegally) prevent millions of Medicaid patients from coming to Planned Parenthood for care. #IStandWithPP
